Post:
"I'm feeling so lost and hopeless right now. I've been through so much in my life, and it seems like everything is just piling up on me. I can't escape the feeling that I'm never going to be able to find happiness or peace. #suicidalthoughts #mentalhealth #sadness"

Note: This post is an example of a Global Attributional Style (GAS) attribution, as it attributes the individual's current situation (feeling lost and hopeless) to their entire life (history of abuse, social anxiety, and feelings of isolation and sadness). It also implies that the individual's whole life is affected by these negative experiences.
Transferred_Post: "I'm struggling with negative thoughts and feelings of hopelessness right now, mainly due to my history of abuse, social anxiety, and isolation. However, I'm trying to focus on finding ways to cope with these emotions and improve my mental health, rather than letting them consume my entire life."

Post: [INSTS]
Transferred_Post:
Sure, I understand the definitions of Global Attributional Style (GAS) and Specific Attributional Style (SPAS). I'll transfer the given posts from GAS to SPAS format.
